name: Zapdos

attacks.name: Thunderstorm
attacks.text: For each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon, flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Then, Zapdos does 10 damage times the number of tails to itself.

flavorText: A legendary thunderbird Pokémon whose anger is said to cause storms. Some say it has lived above the clouds for thousands of years.

strengths: 80 HP is solid for a Basic
Thunderstorm can deal significant bench damage
Lightning type hits Water Pokemon hard
weaknesses: Self-damage on tails can be significant
Coin flip dependent for bench damage
40 damage to Active is low for 4 energy

competitiveHistory: Fossil Zapdos was another legendary bird with no weakness, making it naturally resilient. Thunderstorm's ability to potentially hit multiple benched Pokemon for 20 each was appealing for spread strategies, but the self-damage risk and high energy cost limited its effectiveness. It was generally considered inferior to the Base Set Zapdos which had more efficient attacks.

rulings.ruling: Flip one coin for each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. Each heads deals 20 damage to that Pokemon.
After resolving bench damage, count total tails and Zapdos takes 10 damage per tail.
If opponent has no Benched Pokemon, no coins are flipped and Zapdos takes no self-damage.
Thunderstorm always does 40 damage to the Active Pokemon regardless of coin flips.
